title: Fontbase for Macintosh released
content:
Following the release of Fontbase for Windows in December, DTP Types Limited are pleased to announce the release of Fontbase for Macintosh, the font cataloging and database program.

You can find more information at: [http://www.dtptypes.com/software/fontbase.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130825002153/http:/www.dtptypes.com/software/fontbase.html "http://www.dtptypes.com/software/fontbase.html").
author: malcolm
